betterquesting:10.desc:8:
As I was exploring the testificate villages, I stumbled into a very singular piece of text. The ramblings of a crazed person obsessed with furnaces? The hidden secret behind a great power?
Well, I may have been corrupted by this craziness, but I thing there may be something more to this, and I am determined to find out!
If there is such a thing as a furnace dimension, I will find out!
